channel.title: 码上同行 - Code Journey Together
channel.description: A father-daughter tech blog about coding adventures

item.title: Hello, World! Our Coding Journey Begins
item.description: Welcome to Code Journey Together! This is a blog where a father and daughter explore the world of programming together. We'll share what we learn, our projects, and fun tech stories.

item.title: 你好，世界！我们的编程之旅开始了
item.description: 欢迎来到码上同行！这是一个父亲和女儿一起探索编程世界的博客。在这里，我们会分享学习心得、项目经验和技术趣事。

item.title: How We Built This Blog
item.description: Sharing our journey of building this blog with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Velite. From scratch, step by step, creating a modern static blog.

item.title: 我们是怎么搭建这个博客的
item.description: 分享我们用 Next.js、Tailwind CSS 和 Velite 搭建这个博客的过程。从零开始，一步步构建一个现代化的静态博客。

item.title: 冬日自驾：从蓟县老家到沧州铁狮子
item.description: 凌晨五点出发，带着孩子去看望爷爷奶奶，再一路向南奔赴沧州。一天的奔波，满满的幸福。
